original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)

original: 16.16. Kusalattika, Cittaduka
analyzed: kusalattika

original: Kusalaṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ
analyzed: kusalam cittam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusala
